body_html: I did bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --local_resources 5120,2.0,1.0 //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer. Looks like it's still using all four cores of my computer. Though my computer is not yet crashing right now.
body_text: I did bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --local_resources 5120,2.0,1.0 //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer. Looks like it's still using all four cores of my computer. Though my computer is not yet crashing right now.
body:
I did `bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --local_resources 5120,2.0,1.0 //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer`. Looks like it's still using all four cores of my computer. Though my computer is not yet crashing right now.

![screenshot from 2016-11-03 19-43-39](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11130276/19964672/157974e2-a1fe-11e6-8fd1-4dbdb817e294.png)
